I have the following T206 cards for sale.  Check-out the link (mostly lower grade but respectable commons with a few "Southern Leaguers" thrown in for good luck).  Prices include shipping and the dreaded handling charge!  Paypal, check, MO...all work for me (my prices are UNDER each pic):


[url]http://jaguar.ir.miami.edu/~iggy/T206_Sale[/url]



I also have a T206 Waddell with a Hindu back but with some back damage (sort'a like meeting the girl of your dreams but her mother is your worst nightmare).  I'll take offers on the Waddell card...

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1208458817.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1208458830.JPG[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1208458472.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1208458485.JPG[/IMG] 
*****SOLD****


My email address is agonzdude@yahoo.com

-Lovely Day
